skillTree.name: Chaos Steed
skillTree.description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

skillTree.name: Chaos Warshrine
skillTree.description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +1 for "Gate of Nurgle"
Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Nurgle"

skillTree.name: Bloated Carcass
skillTree.description: Anything fired at this vile Nurglish servant's immense girth must penetrate many folds of sweaty fat before they even have the slightest chance of piercing his flesh.

skillTree.name: Hates Tzeentch
skillTree.description: The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Infernal Champion
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Revelrous Warhost
skillTree.description: The warhost seeks glories for the Dark Gods, erecting perverse monuments to earn their favor.

skillTree.name: Twisted Artifacts
skillTree.description: All manner of terrible, twisted artifacts can be found.

skillTree.name: Prophet
skillTree.description: No price is too small for the Gods.

effects.description:
Character experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain per turn: +200
	(Lord's army)

Character experience gain per turn: +300
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Plunder the Feeble
skillTree.description: The southern races are weak. Their souls and monuments will be offered to the Gods in equal measure!

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.name: God’s Pact
skillTree.description: There is a price to all things, a cost which has been determined by the Gods and will be exacted from those with the courage to strike a deal.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Architect
skillTree.description: My lord, we can save time and supplies if we make some slight modifications to this design.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Nurgle corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Nurgle corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Nurgle corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Fomenter
backgroundSkills.description: Unusually subtle for one so foul, this one is skilled in spreading Nurgle's insanitary ways and words across the land.

effects.description:
Attrition: +25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(enemy armies in region)

backgroundSkills.name: Repellent
backgroundSkills.description: This one finds the enemy can barely stand to come near them, let alone attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Scabrous
backgroundSkills.description: When this one's countless lesions and warts finish weeping and harden up, a natural, protective carapace is left behind in their place.

backgroundSkills.name: Infectious
backgroundSkills.description: If a population are confined to their toilets or beds at home they're not able to spread dissent and sedition as readily, if at all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Corpulent
backgroundSkills.description: Ogres aside, being this large and ungainly would almost certainly kill most other creatures, but when you're beloved of the Urfather it is actually an advantage.

backgroundSkills.name: Fatness
backgroundSkills.description: Other will also feel it.

backgroundSkills.name: Shields of Plague
backgroundSkills.description: Arrows will break.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 5% for Plaguebearers of Nurgle and Exalted Plaguebearers of Nurgle units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Horde
backgroundSkills.description: Nurglings hordes never end.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Nurglings units
	(all units in army)

Armour: +5 for Nurglings units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Rotten and Gallant
backgroundSkills.description: Let them come.

backgroundSkills.name: Corruption of the Father
backgroundSkills.description: Lands will rot.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 when defending 
	(all units in army)
